doc:
Edna Purviance https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edna_Purviance 0 Olga Edna Purviance (; October 21, 1895 – January 13, 1958) was an American actress during the silent movie era. She was the leading lady in many of Charlie Chaplin's early films and in a span of eight years, she appeared in over 30 films with him. Olga_Edna_Purviance ( ; October_21_,_1895 – January_13_,_1958 ) was an_American_actress during the_silent_movie_era . She was the_leading_lady in many of Charlie_Chaplin 's_early_films and in a_span of eight_years , she appeared in over_30_films with him .
